taskGroup.name: Query your models using IncQuery
taskGroup.intro: EMF-IncQuery is a technology that can be used to efficiently query EMF instance models in an incremental way. After completing the tasks, you will know how to create an IncQuery plug-in, how to use it, and where to look for further information. These sheets guide you through simple example that works immediately.

task.name: Creating an EMF-IncQuery Project
task.intro: This sheet describes how to create an EMF-IncQuery plug-in project from scratch.

task.name: Creating and Executing Queries
task.intro: This sheet describes how to create EMF-IncQuery queries.

task.name: Generating Code from Queries
task.intro: This cheat sheet describes the automatic creation of a sample UI project which demonstrates how EMF-IncQuery queries can be invoked from Java code. The Sample UI project provides a menu contribution that displays the query results in a dialog window.
